title: Bug 20249 - Change editor/view/perspective F1 help not staying open
description: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 displays some help. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing the user from reading the contents. If F1 is intended to provide help for the change editor menu, the help window should stay open for the user to read.
OB: When pressing F1 in the change editor menu, the help window should remain open for the user to read the contents.
SR: Ensure that the help window in the change editor menu stays open after pressing F1 so that the user can read the contents.
